text: Han Sang-hun (born June 3, 1980) is a former South Korean professional baseball infielder who played for the Hanwha Eagles of KBO League. ==References== ==External links== *Career statistics and player information from Korea Baseball Organization Category:KBO League infielders Category:South Korean baseball players Category:Hanwha Eagles players Category:Kyung Hee University alumni Category:Baseball players from Seoul Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Han Sang-hun
